text: Penicillium miczynskii is a species of the genus Penicillium which was isolated from soil under conifers in Poland.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Penicillium miczynskii produces citreoviridin. == Further reading == * * * * == References == miczynskii Category:Fungi described in 1927
title: Penicillium miczynskii
